== Panjal (627731) ==

Panjal is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 692 hectares and harbouring 1421 households with total population of 6388 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Shoranur]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 3104 and female population is 3284. Scheduled Caste Population is 674 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1. Census Location Code of the village is 627731<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
